description:
This online course is an introduction to the 9 building blocks of the business model canvas developed by Alexander Osterwalder and Yves Pigneur in their book “Business Model Generation”

In this course, I will go through each of the building block of the business model canvas.

Each lesson describe one of the building block of the business model canvas is in a different video.

We will talk about:

  • Customer Segment
  • Value Proposition
  • Channels
  • Customer Relationship
  • Revenue Streams
  • Key Resources
  • Key Activities
  • Key Partnerships
  • Cost Structure

At the end of this course, you will be able to understand what is a business model, the 9 building blocks and you will be able to create your own.

if you are looking to start a business you can also check our courses on Business Planning.
title: Business Model Generation Workshop
